item.title: 华尔街对 2026 年的预期
item.description: 每年，华尔街的顶尖人物、策略师、经济学家和投资组合经理们都会将他们的最佳观点写进密集的市场展望报告中，每份报告往往长达一百页甚至更多。每年，彭博社资深市场编辑山姆-波特（Sam Potter）都会对这些展望进行提炼，以捕捉共识，并确定谁将脱颖而出。在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，萨姆将与主持人大卫-古拉（David Gura）一起讨论华尔街未来一年的走势：从人工智能的持续主导地位以及黄金和债券的前景，到华尔街的未来。【原文：Every year, Wall Street’s top minds — strategists, economists and portfolio managers — pack their best ideas into dense market outlooks, often running a hundred or more pages apiece. And every year, Bloomberg senior markets editor Sam Potter distills those outlooks to capture the consensus and identify who’s breaking from the pack. On today’s Big Take podcast, Sam joins host David Gura to discuss Wall Street’s year ahead: from AI’s continued dominance and the prospects for gold and bonds to Wall】

item.title: 意大利外交部称美国将削减进口意大利面关税
item.description: 意大利外交部表示，美国决定降低对一些意大利面食品牌征收的有争议的反倾销关税。【原文：The US decided to reduce controversial anti-dumping tariffs on some Italian pasta brands, Italy’s Foreign Ministry said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价涨势减弱，澳大利亚央行中枢政策影响前景
item.description: 澳大利亚房价增长在 12 月份有所放缓，两个最大的房地产市场走低，原因是再次加息的风险影响了市场情绪和未来一年的房地产前景。【原文：Australia’s home-price growth decelerated in December and the two biggest markets edged lower, as the risk of renewed interest-rate hikes weighed on both sentiment and the outlook for property in the year ahead.】

item.title: 2026 年，美欧在社交媒体规则上的裂痕只会越来越大
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，在我们展望 2026 年趋势的系列文章中，马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）从伦敦的视角阐述了欧美领导人之间的深刻分歧。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today in our series of essays looking ahead to trends in 2026, Mark Bergen gives the view from London on the deep-set disagreements between European and American leaders.】

item.title: 比亚迪 2025 年销售 460 万辆汽车，实现修订后的销售目标
item.description: 比亚迪公司实现了全年销售目标，并有可能在2025年超过特斯拉公司，成为全球最大的电动汽车制造商；这一里程碑因中国汽车市场未来一年充满挑战的前景而蒙上了阴影。【原文：BYD Co. met its full-year sales target and likely surpassed Tesla Inc. to become the world’s largest electric vehicle maker in 2025 — a milestone that’s overshadowed by a challenging outlook for the Chinese auto market in the year ahead.】

item.title: 食品价格下降，巴基斯坦通胀放缓幅度超出预期
item.description: 巴基斯坦 12 月份通胀率的上升速度低于预期，这为央行决定将政策利率降至三年来的最低点以支持经济增长提供了理由。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation rate rose slower-than-expected in December, justifying the central bank’s decision to cut its policy rate to a three-year low to support growth.】

item.title: 土耳其保持温和增税以支持通货紧缩运动
item.description: 土耳其提高了燃料、烟草和酒精饮料的固定消费税，将增幅设定在生产者通胀率之下，以支持中央银行减缓物价增长的努力。【原文：Turkey raised fixed excise taxes on fuel, tobacco and alcoholic beverages, setting increases below producer inflation as policymakers seek to support the central bank’s efforts to slow price growth.】

item.title: 拉加德称保加利亚加入欧元是欧洲的有力象征
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）说，保加利亚周四加入欧元区，证明了欧洲有能力合作并战胜国际逆风。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said Bulgaria joining the euro area on Thursday is a testament to Europe’s ability to collaborate and defy international headwinds.】

item.title: 泰国外国游客年入境人数降至 3300 万
item.description: 泰国以其海滩和休闲氛围而闻名，2025 年，由于一系列震惊全国的事件打击了度假者的信心，泰国的游客人数出现了多年来的首次下降。【原文：Thailand, famed for its beaches and relaxing vibes, saw its first decline in tourist arrivals in years in 2025, as holidaymakers’ confidence was rattled by a series of events that rocked the nation.】

item.title: 印度提高烟草税后，印度卷烟制造商ITC业绩下滑
item.description: 在印度宣布提高烟草产品税后，印度最大的卷烟生产商 ITC Ltd. 的股价创下了近六年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of ITC Ltd., a top cigarette maker in India, plunged the most in nearly six years after India announced higher taxation on tobacco products.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入意外放缓，低于预期
item.description: 澳门博彩业收入在 12 月份增长了 14.8%，低于分析师的预期，这表明世界最大博彩中心的增长可能已经失去了一些动力。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.8% in December, missing analyst expectations, in a sign that growth in the world’s biggest gambling hub might have lost some steam.】

item.title: 历史性大选获胜后，马姆达尼执掌纽约市政权
item.description: 午夜时分，佐赫兰-马姆达尼就任纽约市第 112 任市长，这标志着他在过去一年中不可能实现的历史性权力崛起达到了顶峰。【原文：Zohran Mamdani took office as New York City’s 112th mayor at the stroke of midnight, marking the culmination of his improbable, historic rise to power over the past year.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格延续涨势，支持韩国央行按兵不动
item.description: 首尔的公寓价格连续第 48 周上涨，以 10 月下旬以来最快的速度保持稳定，这些数据支持了中央银行在两周后举行的政策制定会议上保持政策设置不变的理由。【原文：Prices for apartments in Seoul extended their rally to a 48th week, holding at the fastest pace since late October in data backing the case for the central bank to keep settings unchanged when authorities meet to set policy in two weeks.】

item.title: 主权基金进军科技领域，资产规模增至 15 万亿美元
item.description: 全球主权财富基金（Global SWF）的最新报告显示，在这一年里，全球主权财富基金管理的资产达到创纪录的 15 万亿美元，其中许多基金深化了技术投资，并从繁荣的市场中获利。【原文：Sovereign wealth funds globally amassed a record $15 trillion in assets under management in a year when many deepened their technology investments and profited from buoyant markets, according to a new report by Global SWF.】

item.title: 尽管受到关税影响，韩国出口仍保持良好势头
item.description: 韩国的出口在 12 月份保持了增长势头，缓解了对全球贸易保护主义和关税相关不确定性的担忧。【原文：South Korea’s exports maintained growth momentum in December, easing concerns over global trade protectionism and tariff-related uncertainty that had weighed on the country for much of the year.】

item.title: 墨西哥将恢复部分食品关税以援助当地生产商
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆办公室发布法令称，墨西哥将对包括牛肉、猪肉和牛奶在内的几种主食重新征收关税，以促进本地供应。【原文：Mexico will reimpose tariffs on several staple foods including beef, pork and milk in an attempt to favor local supplies, according to a decree from President Claudia Sheinbaum’s office.】

item.title: 在美国压力下，委内瑞拉奥里诺科地带石油产量减少 25
item.description: 由于加勒比海地区的美军限制了出口，加上陆地罢工的威胁进一步给尼古拉斯-马杜罗政权施压，委内瑞拉最丰富的石油储量正在减少。【原文：Venezuela’s output from its richest source of petroleum deposits is decreasing as US forces in the Caribbean limit exports and the threat of land strikes further pressures Nicolás Maduro’s regime.】

item.title: 美国水稻和棉花种植者在 120 亿美元援助中获得最大一笔付款
item.description: 根据周三公布的期待已久的详细信息，在美国农业部 120 亿美元的一揽子援助计划中，美国大米和棉花种植者将获得最大一笔付款。【原文：American growers of rice and cotton stand to get the biggest payments in the US Department of Agriculture’s $12 billion aid package, according to long-awaited details released Wednesday.】

item.title: 致命的马丘比丘火车事故涉及路威酩轩集团和凯雷集团旗下公司
item.description: 全球奢侈品集团路威酩轩轩尼诗-路易威登集团（LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE）和全球最大的私募股权公司之一凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Global luxury conglomerate LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SE and one of the world’s biggest private equity firms, Carlyle Group Inc., hold stakes in train operators facing scrutiny after a fatal crash on a railway that ferries tourists to Machu Picchu.】

item.title: 欧洲航天局称服务器可能遭到网络攻击
item.description: 欧洲航天局说，一个网络安全问题可能影响了 "极少数 "外部服务器。【原文：The European Space Agency said a cybersecurity issue may have impacted a “very small number” of external servers.】

item.title: 美国解除对被控研发 "捕食者 "间谍软件的三人的制裁
item.description: 美国政府已经解除了对三人的制裁，这三人之前被指控协助 "捕食者 "间谍软件的扩散，这种先进的监控技术据称被用来对付美国人。【原文：The US government has lifted sanctions on three people who it previously accused of aiding in the proliferation of “Predator” spyware, a sophisticated surveillance technology that’s allegedly been used against Americans.】

item.title: 资金短缺的萨克斯在与债权人谈判期间放弃支付债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，资金紧张的零售商萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）在寻求与债权人谈判达成协议之际，放弃了本周二应向债券持有人支付的总额超过 1 亿美元的利息。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises, the cash-strapped retailer, skipped an interest payment to bondholders totaling more than $100 million that was due Tuesday as it looks to negotiate a deal with creditors, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 加拿大股票在 "令人瞠目 "的一年中创下多项纪录
item.description: 从四月初的情况来看，加拿大股票市场正在结束本世纪第二好的一年，这没有什么意义。【原文：It makes little sense, when viewed from early April, that Canadian equities are closing out their second-best year this century.】

item.title: 阿波罗将把 Coinstar 出售给阿拉斯加买家，债券将得到偿还
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Coinstar LLC, the coin-exchange and cryptocurrency business owned by Apollo Global Management Inc., plans to repay bondholders next month as part of its surprise sale to a company that oversees investments for natives of Alaska’s far north, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利养老金提案力图限制提高收益的掉期交易
item.description: 智利监管机构正在考虑制定基于风险和流动性的规则，以控制被称为 AFPs 的养老基金对衍生品的使用，在外国利率头寸帮助推动回报率在 2025 年创下八年新高，但导致对潜在财务压力的担忧之后，监管机构加强了审查。【原文：Chilean regulators are considering rules based on risk and liquidity to rein in the use of derivatives by pension funds known as AFPs, tightening their scrutiny after foreign interest rate positions helped push returns to an eight-year high in 2025 but led to concerns about potential financial strain.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国家石油公司计划开发新油田以提高产量
item.description: 尼日利亚国有石油生产商计划从明年起开发新油田，并寻求在本十年结束前筹集至少 300 亿美元资金，熟悉该计划的高级官员如是说。【原文：Nigeria’s state-owned oil producer plans to develop new oil fields from next year and seeks to raise at least $30 billion by the end of the decade, senior officials familiar with the plans said.】
